definition: a discoloration caused by heat, become scorched or singed under intense heat or dry conditions
details:
noun
- a discoloration caused by heat
- a plant disease that produces a browning or scorched appearance of plant tissues
- a surface burn
= synonyms: singe
verb
- become scorched or singed under intense heat or dry conditions
= example: become scorched or singed under intense heat or dry conditions
- make very hot and dry
= example: make very hot and dry
= synonyms: sear
- burn slightly and superficially so as to affect color
= synonyms: sear
- destroy completely by or as if by fire
= example: destroy completely by or as if by fire
- become superficially burned
= synonyms: sear
